subject: Baseball
World Series
lead_paragraph: The team’s coaches unanimously decided to stick with their usual lineup against right-handers, which meant that Conforto, the struggling rookie, would start in perhaps the most important game of the season.
snippet: The team’s coaches unanimously decided to stick with their usual lineup against right-handers, which meant that Conforto, the struggling rookie, would start in perhaps the most important game of the season.
